KA.AQWE.content: guardians as crime against human nature, man is made to progress toward enlightenment [telos]
KA.AQWE.linkedContent: guardians as crime against human nature, man is made to progress toward enlightenment [telos]

KA.EP.content: the tricks of the despot: 1) fac et excusa (act now, justify later) 2) si fecisti, nega (if you committed the crime deny it) 3) divide et impera (divide & conquer)
KA.EP.linkedContent: the tricks of the despot: 1) fac et excusa (act now, justify later) 2) si fecisti, nega (if you committed the crime deny it) 3) divide et impera (divide & conquer)
